column9: I have taken Sulindac treatment twice:  once for achy feet which eventually got better;  then I used Sulindac for lower back pain and still use it regularly for that.  It enables me to have a normal, active life.

column2: Jess, 55-64 Male  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I was prescribed 200 milligrams twice daily for suspected back problems that radiated down my right leg. Until I was prescribed this medication, Sodium Naproxen wouldn't relieve the severe pain and I was basically incapacitated. I'm able to function, instead of being bed ridden due to my inability to walk.
